item.title: TitlePanel - GWT Tutorial - CodeTab
item.description: 6.3.Â TitlePanel TitlePanel displays the symbol name on selection by the user and uses a SimplePanel and Label. Why a separate widget when a Label is suffice, and reason for this is with more and more widgets added to Snapshot events handling becomes complicated and with a separate widget we can wire events much more elegantly. Hence TitlePanel is pulled out as a separate widget with TitlePanel.ui.xml and TitlePanel.java.
